channel.title: Audio emote
channel.description: Hello, After several online sessions, I realize I really enjoy having a silent channel to emote. It can be video or chat or the emote function of the app. But. Using video or a certain app is not always possible and keeping an eye on the chat is sometimes a brain overload. I'm thinking of an audio code with 3 signals (Y N ?) or a call to chat, chosen in accordance with the setting and tone. The easiest would be a live sound. But maybe you'll see an accessible and transapplication way of doing that?

item.title: Audio emote
item.dc:creator: @DeReel
item.description:
@DeReel wrote:

Hello,
After several online sessions, I realize I really enjoy having a silent channel to emote. It can be video or chat or the emote function of the app.
But.
Using video or a certain app is not always possible and keeping an eye on the chat is sometimes a brain overload. I’m thinking of an audio code with 3 signals (Y N ?) or a call to chat, chosen in accordance with the setting and tone. The easiest would be a live sound. But maybe you’ll see an accessible and transapplication way of doing that?

Read full topic
